text:
It would be nice to be able to use the feature to turn on and off the showing of
grid lines. This is a property of a sheet and can be set in Excel via
Tools/Options/View by clicking on the checkbox Gridlines. By the way the flag
for printing grid lines works fine.
creator: brianpreuss@gmx.de

text: This was fixed before 2.0-RC1 (Aug 2003 svn r353305).
creator: josh@apache.org
